title: Moto 360 & Nexus 6p

author: Geoff B
comment: How do I not display weather and steps in ambient mode?

reply.author: SmartWatchStudio
reply.content: After update  watch face works with  default widgets configuration. Try to use tap zones on "3" and "9" hours to set desired widgets.

title: Last time trying

author: Robt
comment: My favorite Watch Face. Looks great and has all the features I need. Thanks

author: Anthony Scriba
comment: Ambient Glow mode would be nice for always on display.
title: Ambient Glow

author: Nathan James
comment: This is my daily driver. Constantly updated for functionality and to fix anything that may have become broken by updates to Android Wear. On that note, the phone battery meter no longer works. Any idea if a fix will be available soon? Still a GREAT watch face on the Moto 360!

reply.author: SmartWatchStudio
reply.content: Thanks for your review and 5-stars! Phone battery should work well in the current version, however if still a problem please email us with more details.

title: My go-to watch face!

comment: Good looking watch face, but the ambient mode need more config like option to disable the widget and also brightness setting for ambient mode.

comment: Does not show steps on Huawei Watch. Both Android Fit and watch steps counters work on other Watch faces but not this one.

title: Compass does not work

author: Thomas Lambrecht
comment: Very nice watchface. The battery meters look awesome.  The compass doesn't work for me either, but I'm not planning on using that anyways.

reply.author: SmartWatchStudio
reply.content: Thank you. New version with fixed compass just released. We are constantly working on improvements our watch faces, more functions will available in next versions and battery life will improved.

author: Simon Marshall
comment: Temperature in Fahrenheit is so US centric. And the resolution looks a bit blocky, could be sharper. Also timer is more useful that stop watch imo.

reply.author: SmartWatchStudio
reply.content: Thank you for your comments. You can select Celsius in "Temperature unit" option of "Weather Settings" . Also we planned to add timer widget in one of next release.

title: Good but

comment: Uninstalled. Compass does not work.

reply.author: SmartWatchStudio
reply.content: Thank you for info. Issue with compass fixed and now compass works fine.
